urls.title: Terms & conditions for advance seat selection
urls.description: 1. Advance seat selection is available up to 48 hours before flight departure on flights operated by Singapore Airlines. 2. All seats offered for advance selection will always be subject to availability at the time of request. Seats offered and selected will be on a per passenger and per flight segment basis. 3.
